name: BuyersOptInClick
description: Buyers Agent opt in click options

src.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT LoanGuid FROM app.TextOptIn 
WHERE CellPhone = '[Get:BACP]' )
BEGIN
select OptIn,

CASE

When OptIn IS NULL or OptIn = '' Then 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:BuyersOptInPopUp]}); return false();'
When OptIn IS NOT NULL or OptIn <> '' Then 'return false();'
Else 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:BuyersOptInPopUp]}); return false();'
END AS Click
from app.TextOptIn
where LoanGuid = '[Get:LG]' and CellPhone = '[Get:BACP]'

END
ELSE
BEGIN

select 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:[LOSM:BuyersOptInPopUp]}); return false();' AS Click
END
